title: Gazebo main window doesn't refresh on windows

content.raw:
The Gazebo server and client are built without errors with MSBuild (VS 2013) on windows 10 and all client and server are launched correctly, but the main window doesn't fresh at all. 

I am able to operate the toolbar and place the shapes to the scene, you can only see it with the screen shot function.
